sentences.en: Draw the floss backwards and forwards between the teeth.
sentences.cn: 将牙线在齿间来回拉动。

sentences.en: He controlled the car until it was pointing forwards again.
sentences.cn: 他稳住车子，直到它又朝前开去。

sentences.en: He lit the gas and began to pace backwards and forwards.
sentences.cn: 他点燃了煤气炉,然后开始来回地在地上踱着步.

sentences.en: He stood a few moments, rocking back and forwards on his heels.
sentences.cn: 他站了一会儿，踮着脚跟前后摇晃。

sentences.en: His foot caught in a rock and he pitched forwards.
sentences.cn: 他的脚被岩石绊了一下,身子就朝前倒下.

sentences.en: It moves, it vibrates backwards and forwards.
sentences.cn: 它在运动, 前后震动.

sentences.en: People should forget and look forwards.
sentences.cn: 人们应该忘记过去向前看。

sentences.en: She fell forwards on to her face.
Space scientists and astronomers have taken another step forwards.
sentences.cn: 航天科学家和天文学家又取得了进展。

sentences.en: The horse jumped forwards and round her, winding the rope round her waist.
sentences.cn: 那匹马围着她向前跳，把绳子绕在了她腰上。

sentences.en: The paging UI allows you to navigate backwards and forwards through displayed data, displaying a fixed number of records at a time.
sentences.cn: 该分页 UI 使您能够在所显示的数据之间向前和向后导航，并且一次显示固定数量的记录。

sentences.en: The shuttle moves backwards and forwards through the warp.
sentences.cn: 梭子在经线中来回移动.

sentences.en: The single door hinges forwards and upwards, so such cars can be parked facing the pavement and close together—indeed, three of them can sit abreast in a standard parking place.
sentences.cn: 唯一的门可以向前和向上开启，所以这样的车可以面向着道路紧密停靠在一起，当然，三辆这样的车可以并排停在一个标准停车位里。

sentences.en: The sudden stopping of the car plunged him forwards.
sentences.cn: 汽车急刹车,使得他猛地向前倾去.

sentences.en: Together they illustrate the importance of understanding the lifecycle -- backwards, forwards, and inside out -- so that you can manipulate it when you need to.
sentences.cn: 将这些问题汇总在一起，就能体现充分理解生命周期的重要性 —— 向后、向前或由内向外，这样您就可以在需要的时候操纵它。

sentences.en: Travelling backwards and forwards everyday cost him too much money.
sentences.cn: 每天来回花了他太多的钱.

sentences.en: We can drive a car forwards or backwards, but not sideways.
sentences.cn: 我们开车可以向前或后退, 但不能侧着开.

sentences.en: We live forwards, a Danish thinker has said, but we understand backwards.
sentences.cn: 一位丹麦思想家曾说过,我们的生活是向前的, 但是我们的认识却是向后的.

phrases.tran_cn: 涌现；自告奋勇；被提出来讨论
大跃进（中国于1958～1960年执行的经济计划）
向前移动，提步向前；向前发展
v. 提出；拿出；放出；推举出

trans.tran_cn: 促进( forward的第三人称单数 )，（按新地址）转寄，发送，助长
